name: Tankcraft (itch)
description:
Started during January 2022, this project was made by myself and my friend Limphus (https://limphus.itch.io/)

The game is about a world that has fallen into an apocalypse that has ended and people rely on tanks to fight other survivors and to survive.

The brief overview of the mechanics was to have an in-depth crafting system with an art style that compliments the mechanics of the game, the game's primary focus is to kill turrets in the level go to the garage and see the number of parts you have collected and upgrade to either of the 3 tiers.
